doc.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
doc.plot: Kareena returns for the funeral of her grand-father, to the family home. As the story unfolds we realize the dark cloud she left the family home under was not of her own making. She was left in the care of her aunt and uncle after her parents died... and it is the uncle who caused the cloud Kareena left under - not Kareena, as the family still believes. A dark coming of age drama, that deals with child abuse in the Indian community in South Africa. During her cousin's wedding, a few days after the funeral Kareena extracts her revenge on her Uncle, with shocking consequences. Revenge is a dish best served cold...
